About JSONata Studio

A code editing app for transforming JSON structures and debugging JSONata expressions in a browser with instant feedback.

Available at www.jsonatastudio.com.

My role

I have been working on this project as a Full-Stack Software Developer since May 2024.

Learning objectives

  • Utilise Next.js, Monaco Editor and Tailwind CSS to build a playground for evaluating and debugging JSONata expressions against a JSON input with instant feedback
  • Integrate a JSONata code editor with a custom theme, language, syntax highlighting and syntax validation
  • Set up routing with Next's app directory and utilise server-side rendering
  • Implement authentication with AWS Cognito and the Amplify library
  • Create public and protected APIs with Route Handlers
  • Utilise Remark and Rehype to publish a blog with articles written in Markdown
